content: we ve reached the last of the seven snowflake patterns from my 2025 collection this project combines lacy elements with a more solid center if you use heavier yarn and stiffen it dry it could even double as a festive coaster this snowflake is a part of the 2025 free crochet snowflake patterns collection see all snowflake patterns here on crochetpedia com 1 the pattern is available in the form of **written instructions** and **video tutorials** for right- and left-handed crocheters 1 https //crochetpedia com/crochet-snowflakes-mini-cal/
